features: PORTABLE DESIGN: Collapsible Silicone Water Bottle with a hand ring for you to carry around.
SAFE&ECO-FRIENDLY MATERIALS:E-senior Water Bottles are made of 100% food-grade silicone.
VERSATILE:Not only for travel, but for everyday activities such as hiking, camping,commuting,exercise,road trips,outdoor events,and school.
ROLLABLE&PACKABLE:Collapsible Silicone allow the bottle can easily be rolled up and squashed down when space is tight.
LEAKPROOF:The rotatable cap design securely seal for travel and storage of water,milk,etc,prevents the bottle from accidentally opening，The bottle itself is tightly sealed and will not leak either.
body.description: E-Senior Collapsible Water Bottle helps save place and reduce wastes. Multi-occasion use: For outdoor sports such as hiking,biking,running,the lightweight & collapsible design allows you to exercise outdoors without having to make room for it in your backpack like regular water bottle needs.It even can be fit in in your Pants pockets. This bottle is all you need to keep you hydrated while on-the-go, portable and the right size for you to hold your drinkable water for the day. About the material: This bottle is made from food grade silicone which is non-toxic,odorless,soft,durable.But faint odor is inevitable due to the production process.Here are some methods to eliminated: Exposing the collapsible water bottle to air for 2-3 days, the taste will fade drift away. Mixed brine with a small amount of vinegar,soak the collapsible water bottle for 10 minutes or more. This is the most effective way to remove the odor of silicone. Fill with equal parts white vinegar and water,soak for 24hrs,rinse and air out to dry.

This bottle is all you need to keep you hydrated while on-the-go, portable and the right size for you to hold your drinkable water for the day. About the material: This bottle is made from food grade silicone which is non-toxic,odorless,soft,durable.But faint odor is inevitable due to the production process.Here are some methods to eliminated: Exposing the collapsible water bottle to air for 2-3 days, the taste will fade drift away. Mixed brine with a small amount of vinegar,soak the collapsible water bottle for 10 minutes or more. This is the most effective way to remove the odor of silicone. Fill with equal parts white vinegar and water,soak for 24hrs,rinse and air out to dry.

Unique foldable design You can compress E-Senior collapsible water bottle to smallest shape to put into bag,save space. NO MORE LEAKS IN YOUR BAG 100% leak-proof to prevent annoying spills. 100% BPA Free Material E-Senior collapsible water bottle was made of BPA free and 100% non-toxic food grade silicone material ;What's more That material makes this bottle tough enough to survive accidental drops, also makes it safe to drink water

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Must- Have for Travel!
reviews.reviewText: When I travel, I'm so bad about hydrating. It's so hard to find water, and water bottles can be hard to lug around. Not this one! It's light and the handle makes it easy to walk around with. Plus, when you finish, it folds up and can fit in your coat pocket or bag. It fits easily in your carry-on without taking up any room, then you can fill it part security. Best travel purchase I've made!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Handy for travel
reviews.reviewText: I bought this water bottle specifically to carry on an airplane. It's perfect for that because it rolls very small to store in a purse or carry on, then easily expands to fill at the water bottle filler on the other side of security. It holds plenty of water and seals tightly, plus the strap that holds it when rolled makes a nice handle when filled. It's great to put in backpack pockets AND seatback pockets on the plane because it's flexible even when full. The reason for only 4 stars is because the lid is completely unattached, and I forsee a time in the future when it will roll away from me across the concourse or down the plane aisle. If it were attached with a strap, chain, etc. it would be a full 5 stars. If they ever release a version with an attached lid, I'll buy a replacement immediately. I also recommend practicing drinking from it because if you hold it in the middle only, it's possible it will bend far enough to spill on yourself. It didn't actually happen, but it's an issue I didn't think about until I actually drank from it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great on the go bottle
reviews.reviewText: I used this while on vacation with my baby for his baby water. Easy to clean, fits comfortably in my carry on. Folds up very small when emptied. No strong smell & added no taste to the water (I tested to make sure).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Still had a strange taste after washing several times.
reviews.reviewText: I will say that it does wrap up and doesn't take up much space, but it's kind of hard to drink from, as it's wobbly. The reason for less stars is that I still could taste the material even after I washed it well several times.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Def have a learning curve to drink a wobbly container without spilling at first, but then it’s awesome! Fits in your pocket + purse easily. Doesn’t leak

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job!
reviews.reviewText: We've taken this bottle to Japan, Italy and on numerous US based trips. It's easy and convenient. If you put flavored stuff in it, I think the silicone absorbs that and it was hard to get out. But sticking yo water, it's great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Hard to keep clean
reviews.reviewText: Wanted to love this as it was a great space saver and I liked the design. But on my first trip it grew mold inside and the opening is too small to clean it properly. Going back to glass and metal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works, but a little hard to fill and drink
reviews.reviewText: Liked the concept, but was hard to fill at water stations with smaller opening. Also need two hands to drink because not solid.

reviews.reviewTitle: As the other person said, it leaks!
reviews.reviewText: So upon receiving it, I immediately needed to return it, because the specs labelled is wrong (I was hoping the lifestraw woudl fit into it, but the size they indicated for the opening is not right, also it got even narrower after). Then I thought ok, maybe I'll try it even if I can't fit the lifestraw in. I'll use it.We brought it to our trip and it was the most useless thing ever. The one thin you really need a water bottle to do is to hold water. These ones do not hold any water -- half the water would be gone and leak everywhere after an hour. Complete garbage!
Práctico por tamaño pero no resulta práctico para poder lavarlo por dentro

reviews.reviewTitle: Great for a bit, but made the water taste weird
reviews.reviewText: It was fabulous for space-saving while I was on hikes, and its also really lightweight and leakproof. But after two weeks of use the water started tasting plastic-y when I was taking it on hikes, so I will not be using it anymore.
Rolls up so incredibly small! Love it.
Muy práctica y muy bonito el color.
